page.title: 19LIVING IN PENNARD IN 1985.
page.content: OUR AREA IS A VERY POPULAR TOURIST ATTRACTION, BECAUSE OF ITS NATURAL BEAUTY. TOURISTS STAY HERE IN THE SUMMER AT GUEST HOUSES OR PREFER TO CAMP OR CARAVAN OUTDOORS. THERE ARE MANY ACTIVITIES FOR THE TOURISTS TO ENJOY. IN SANDY LANE THERE ARE SUMMER CHALETS FOR THE TOURISTS TO RENT OVER THE SUMMER. LIFE IN PENNARD IS VERY ORDINARY. IT HAS ADVANTAGES AND DISADVANTAGES. ADVANTAGES IN BEING NEAR THE SEA AND HAVING PLENTY OF PLACES TO PLAY, ALSO THERE ARE MANY PLACES TO SHOP FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS. DISADVANTAGES IN HAVING LOTS OF TOURISTS AROUND AND HAVING SOME TOURISTS RUINING THE BEACH AND ITS SURROUNDINGS BY DROPPING LITTER AND NOT CARING FOR THE LAND. THERE IS PLENTY OF COUNTRYSIDE. THE AIR IS FRESH WITH NO POLLUTION. PENNARD IS A PLEASANT PLACE TO LIVE.
